tag.raw: Mennonite World Conference Winnipeg Manitoba Canada
tag.author: 52529054@N06

description._content:
Caption: Some 16,000 plus have taken their seats; the stage is set; the cast is ready; and the stage hands are standing by. And Jake said, 'Let the program begin!' And behold, it was good! Many committee members and volunteers had worked hard to prepare for this week, and had awaited the Opening Night with some anxiety. Would it all work? And then, when this large, multi-cultural family raised its voice in praise to its creator God, the anxiety melted away and prayers of thanks were quietly said that everything could have come together so beautifully.

Citation: Mennonite World Conference. Twelfth Mennonite World Conference, 1990, Winnipeg, Canada. Slides by T. Klassen; Script by John Dyck. X-9 Box 52 Folder 4 Slide 16. Mennonite Church USA Archives - Goshen. Goshen, Indiana.
